line.comment: * chooses the target sector for a new Coordinated Invasion
* returns false if not enough suitable Battlegroups or target sectors are available
* CI type
* creating a list of potential target sectors
* important player Outposts
* half levelled up ship/station production specialization
* ship component storage
* many bonus perks
* many factories
* best production
* best research
* energy hubs
* mining hubs
* bottlenecks inside player faction
* the $targets array is still empty if border sectors was our only restriction
* from here on we only ever remove targets !
* summed up distance of the target sector to each of our sectors divided by their total number. (we can only target in our general sphere of influence)
* of individual Battlegroups
* of entire operation. default 2000 points is equal to 4x M2 destroyer
* reality check. we always want our CI to be at least twice stronger than all current enemies in target sector
* which is our most powerful Battlegroup?
* remove too weak Battlegroups
* our target sector is often the one closest to the champion
*################################# but for some aggressive CIs we want more range
*set this in the CI types!!!! ##################
* fill up with Battlegroups which are at similar distance like our champion so nobody has to wait too long on each other
*we can repeat this as often as there are battlegroups left to fill with
*is the CI filled up?
* with minimum power we randomly stop or add even more squadrons
*#################################### cautious, peace loving and Tyrant AI always concentrates all forces
* after adding all BGs with same distance we slowly widen our search band around the target sector
*got enough power?
*set ship variables, rallyGate, retreat, target sector?
*restart Battlegroup command
*set global status variable

sval.val: Adjacency perk bonus

returns false if not enough suitable Battlegroups or target sectors are available

of individual Battlegroups
of entire operation. default 2000 points is equal to 4x M2 destroyer

remove too weak Battlegroups

################################# but for some aggressive CIs we want more range
set this in the CI types!!!! ##################

we can repeat this as often as there are battlegroups left to fill with

with minimum power we randomly stop or add even more squadrons
#################################### cautious, peace loving and Tyrant AI always concentrates all forces
after adding all BGs with same distance we slowly widen our search band around the target sector
